alert.note: Alert for Grant; Hamilton; Morton; Stanton; Stevens (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 27 at 12:45PM CST until February 28 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Critical Risk of Wildfire Spread Tuesday Afternoon... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON CST /11 AM MST/ TO 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ TUESDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 061, 074, 075, 084, AND 085... The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from noon CST /11 AM MST/ to 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ Tuesday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 061 Hamilton, Fire Weather Zone 074 Stanton, Fire Weather Zone 075 Grant, Fire Weather Zone 084 Morton and Fire Weather Zone 085 Stevens. * WINDS...West 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 10 percent. * IMPACTS...Given the ongoing drought and widespread dry dormant fuels, any ignitions Tuesday afternoon will have the potential to burn out of control quickly.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
